text: Eve is a 2015 Christian fantasy novel written by William P. Young. ==Plot== A retelling of the biblical fall of man told from a female perspective, the novel tells the story of Lilly Fields, the broken daughter of Eve. ==References== ==External links== *Author's official site Category:2015 American novels Category:2015 Canadian novels Category:English-language novels Category:American Christian novels Category:Fantasy novels Category:Cultural depictions of Adam and Eve
title: Eve (Young novel)
